main.name: José Valdiviezo
main.description: Soy una apasionado por la programación, siempre en búsqueda de nuevos desafíos que me ayuden a aprender ¡¿¡y que me reten para alcanzar nuevos límites
main.bio: Hola, Soy José Luis, actualmente estoy estudiando en el instituto Holberton school. Estoy terminado fundamentos de software engineer
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: This is the school I am currently attending and where I have been able to solidify many of my skills.
Este es el instituto donde me gradue y puede solidificar mis talentos fundamentales para ir explorar el mundo y continuar con mi educación

work.title: Voluntariado Social
descriptions: Durante mi tiempo libre me gusta atender diferentes actividades de ayuda social, esta es una oportunidad que estado realizando desde muy temprano forjando mi caracter de buen y honesto ciudadano.

work.title: Restaurant Crew
descriptions: Era uno de los parrilleros mas eficiencia, y veloces, este fue el primer trabajo que tuve y me ayudo aprender el valor del trabajo

check.title: Contacts Manger
check.description: This is a friendly responsive website that allows you to store all of your contacts in an organize manner. This project was developed with MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js.

check.title: Character Keep
check.description: This forms part of a group project where the application was responsible to generate, collect, and save data from tabletop games such as Warhammer. I was in charge to create the mobile component of the interactive application on Android with the use of Java.

check.title: 3D Cell Model
check.description: Develop in JavaScript with the help of Three.js, HTML, CSS, and Vectary. This is an interactive 3d project that allows users to learn the anatomy of an animal cell.

check.title: Atlantic Trails Resort
check.description: Developed with the use of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. This is a friendly responsive website used as the main online tool to represent a vacation Resort.

check.title: PL/0 Compiler
check.description: Develop in C, this program takes PL/0 instructions then it reads them character by character detecting any syntax errors, then it will parse it, and output the result from many of the logistics operations that was able to perform.

check.title: Durable Queue for Non-Volatile Memory:
check.description: This is part of a published research report that explains the scalability from the implementation of a durable queue for non-volatile memory created by my colleagues and me.

check.title: React Native Login System
check.description: This is an example of a project that I decided to create to explore and learn more about the React Native. To authenticate users I am using Google's Firebase tools to get familiar with their authentication system.
